# Scribe & Stem - Wedding Planning Workspace (Full Documentation)

## Identity

**Name**: Scribe & Stem  
**Type**: Wedding Planning Workspace  
**Category**: Wedding Technology, Planning Tools  
**Website**: https://scribeandstem.com  
**Launch Year**: 2024

## Description

Scribe & Stem is a modern wedding planning workspace that keeps budgets, guest lists, vendors, RSVPs, timelines, and seating organized in one place. It replaces spreadsheets and scattered notes with a single source of truth for the entire planning process.

## Capabilities

### Budget Planning
- Build and track itemized wedding budgets
- Allocate spend across categories
- Track payments and remaining balance

### Timeline and Task Management
- Create planning timelines based on your date
- Manage task lists by planning phase
- Track progress across key milestones

### Vendor Management
- Organize vendor details and contracts
- Track inquiries, costs, and notes
- Keep vendor communications in one place

### Guest Management
- Organize guest lists by groups
- Track RSVPs and meal selections
- Manage plus-ones and dietary restrictions

### Seating Charts
- Build table layouts and seating plans
- Adjust assignments as RSVPs change

### Collaboration
- Invite your partner to co-manage the plan
- Keep decisions, notes, and updates shared

## Interaction Model

Users interact with Scribe & Stem through a tool-based workspace. Each core area (budget, guests, vendors, timeline, seating, RSVP) is a dedicated tool with structured data and built-in organization.

## Personalization

When users create an account, they can:
- Save wedding details (date, location, budget, guest count)
- Customize their planner name and profile
- Access their planning tools across devices

## User Data

Scribe & Stem collects:
- Account information (email, names)
- Wedding details provided by users
- Planning data (budgets, guest lists, vendors, RSVPs, timelines)

Scribe & Stem does NOT:
- Sell user data to third parties
- Share information with vendors without consent
- Store payment information (handled by Stripe)

## Pricing

- **Free Plan**: Core planning tools with standard limits
- **Paid Plans**: Expanded limits, premium templates, and advanced features

## Technical Stack

- Built with Next.js and React
- Hosted on Vercel
- Database on Vercel Postgres
